meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Causes Cited in Tire Recall Employees suggest that heavy production demands and lax quality control at a Firestone plant led to problems with tires.
Kosovo Quandary House and Senate negotiators are debating a deadline to pull G.I.'s from Kosovo, putting Gov. George W. Bush on the spot.
Wait for the Games Is Over The beleaguered Olympic movement tries to shift the world's focus to the competitors in Sydney, Australia.
